articles.title: Fubo Knocks $30 Off Streaming Plans As Part of Limited-Time Holiday Promo
articles.mainIdea: Fubo Knocks $30 Off Streaming Plans As Part of Limited-Time Holiday Promo
articles.summary: Variety: Fubo Knocks $30 Off Streaming Plans As Part of Limited-Time Holiday Promo. Live TV streamer Fubo has launched a surprise deal online that knocks up to $30 off the rate of its most popular streaming plans, just in time for the holidays. For a limited time, new users can get the Fubo Pro plan with 200+ channels for just $48.99/month (regularly $73.99) or the Fubo Elite plan …

articles.title: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says
articles.mainIdea: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says
articles.summary: TipRanks: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says. President Trump will announce that the U.S. Navy intends to build a new “Trump-class” battleship as part of the “Golden Fleet” initiative, The Wall Street Journal’s Lara Seligman and Marcus Weisgerber report, citing a U.S. official. The new battleship will be an upgrade relative to the Navy’s Arleigh Burke-class destroyers, which Trump has compared unfavorably to rival navies, the report states. Shares of Huntington Ingalls (HII) are up 4% afterhours following the WSJ report.Claim 70% Off TipRan Related tickers mentioned: GD, HII.

articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Reddit Stock Named Top 2026 Pick For This Key Advantage. Reddit stock seen benefiting from a fast-growing ad business and its ability to license content for AI. Related tickers mentioned: GOOG, OPAI.PVT, RDDT.
